event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Validation
=========================================================

CONTEXT:
Cycle 1 completed the core implementation work. All 66 tests pass (16 API + 10 conductor + 6 stage + 14 adversarial + 19 spec + 1 persistence). The StageOrchestrator now has 100% backward API compatibility with legacy RDMissionController.

OBJECTIVE:
Perform final validation and mark mission complete.

TASKS:
1. VERIFY: Run test suite one final time to confirm no regressions
   - python3 /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/test_api_compatibility.py

2. VERIFY: Confirm USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=true is active and StageOrchestrator is being used
   - python3 -c "import af_engine; print('Modular:', af_engine.USE_MODULAR_ENGINE)"

3. OPTIONAL: Run a quick functional test of the conductor integration if desired

4. COMPLETE: Generate final mission report and mark COMPLETE

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- All tests still pass (66/66)
- No AttributeError when using RDMissionController alias
- Mission can be marked complete

FILES REFERENCE:
- Orchestrator: /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py
- State Manager: /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py
- Test Suite: /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/

NOTE: This is final validation only. All implementation work is complete.

cycle_report.summary: Completed comprehensive API compatibility audit and implementation between StageOrchestrator and legacy RDMissionController. All 16 core API methods/properties verified working. Achieved 100% backward compatibility with 66 tests passing including adversarial edge cases. The modular af_engine can now serve as a drop-in replacement for the legacy controller without any changes to atlasforge_conductor.py.
achievements: Audited complete API surface of legacy RDMissionController
Identified and documented all 16 API methods/properties used by atlasforge_conductor.py
Verified mission getter and setter work correctly
Verified mission_dir property returns Path object
Verified load_mission(), save_mission(), set_mission(), reset_mission() all work
Verified build_rd_prompt() and process_response() work end-to-end
Verified _queue_processing flag exists for backward compatibility
All 14 adversarial edge cases handled gracefully
66 total tests passing with epistemic score of 1.0
